name: Metamorforest
description:
I made this alone over the period of about a month. It is a completely 2D game where I tried to replicate 3D movement.

The player has to survive as many days possible, collecting companions which represent the players heath against something in the night.

The game was featured at A MAZE Johannesburg 2014. Where a journalist voted it one of the top five games there.

Read it here: http://www.htxt.co.za/2014/09/15/5-of-the-best-south-african-indie-games-currently-being-made/
